item.title: Github Pages, Github Actions, and Hugo -- Rinse and Repeat
item.description: Upgrade a single page site to use Hugo One of my good friends, Charlie, is living his dream of being an actor in Hollywood. We are both enjoying our career journeys. Charlie’s career is about to skyrocket. I spoke to Charlie earlier in the day, and had him look at Hugo themes. I also invited Josh to join in and do the same. The plan was to upgrade both of their websites from single page to using Hugo.

item.title: Github Pages, Github Actions, and Hugo
item.description: Making a Hugo site for Github Pages Make javagrunt.github.io Add CNAME for javagrunt.com Setup CNAME at registrar Make a private source repository Create a hugo site, using ‘codex’ theme git clone git@github.com:javagrunt/javagrunt-hugo-src.git hugo new site javagrunt-hugo-src/ --force git submodule add https://github.com/jakewies/hugo-theme-codex.git themes/hugo-theme-codex Add a blog post (this one) hugo new blog/hugo.md Create a Github action to deploy the site https://github.
